segments.text: Mr . Emory ? I think it ’ s time to get a new computer .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why , Christine ? I think the one we have is fine .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: For the amount of work we do on the computer these days , the one we ’ re using is just too weak . We really need a higher model .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I ’ ll think about it . I don ’ t know whether accounting is going to agree to such a big purchase .
segments.speaker: S2
